body: nice doujin to read. good job sir!

Kabe-don, or “wall-pounding” is when a guy suddenly thrusts his hand against a wall, pinning a girl to it. It's one type of situation that's -widely- desired by various females and featured commonly in manga. at least this is what i got after searching
not only she lost a lot of pounds but will also lose his boyfriend and a house to live in lol
